project.name: JUnitReportPrinter
project.scriptdef: importClass(javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory); importClass(java.lang.System); var docElement = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance().newDocumentBuilder().parse(attributes.get("xmlfile")).getDocumentElement(); if(docElement.getElementsByTagName("failure") != null && docElement.getElementsByTagName("failure").getLength() > 0) { for (var i = 0, tsArray = docElement.getElementsByTagName("testsuite"); tsArray != null && i < tsArray.getLength(); i++) { var ts = tsArray.item(i); System.err.println("[TestSuite name=\"" + ts.getAttribute("name") + "\", failures=\"" + ts.getAttribute("failures") + "\"]"); for (var j = 0, cases = ts.getElementsByTagName("testcase"); cases != null && j < cases.getLength(); j++) { var testCase = cases.item(j); var failures = testCase.getElementsByTagName("failure"); if (failures == null || failures.getLength() == 0) { continue; } System.err.println(" " + testCase.getAttribute("name")); for (var k = 0, failures = testCase.getElementsByTagName("failure"); failures != null && k < failures.getLength(); k++) { var failure = failures.item(k); System.err.println(" " + failure.getAttribute("message")); } } } }
